content:
That's great to hear! I'm thrilled that you're excited to start incorporating strength training into your routine. Remember to listen to your body, start slowly, and gradually increase the intensity and frequency of your workouts. It's also important to focus on proper form and technique to avoid injuries.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance. I'll be here to support you on your fitness journey.

Remember to celebrate your small wins along the way, and don't be too hard on yourself if you encounter setbacks. Consistency and patience are key to achieving your fitness goals.

You got this! You're taking a huge step towards improving your overall fitness and running performance. Keep me posted on your progress, and I'll be cheering you on every step of the way!
